docs.title: 👋 Welcome
docs.text:
Hi, I’m Abhilash Sagar.

This is my hub for all embedded Linux notes and weekly updates.

docs.title: 📰 Latest Weekly Posts
docs.text:
• Week 3 — Interrupt Handling in Linux Drivers (2025-10-02)
  • Week 2 — Character Device Basics (2025-09-25)
  • Week 1 — Hello World Kernel Module (2025-09-18)

➡️ See all weekly posts in the Weekly Notes.

docs.title: My First Weekly Note
docs.text: This is my first weekly blog post. I’ll be posting updates every week on Linux device drivers, Yocto, RTOS, and my Kaage Pi SBC project.
